result.reason: Low-demand feature request (1 thumbs up in 6 years); upstream maintainer recommends closing — dev time better spent on higher-impact issues
result.approach: Would require new CLI args (--connect, --protocol, --port) in ParseCommandLineArgs and wiring to ConnectionInitiator, but low demand does not justify the effort

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the issue analysis — it's a feature request for CLI-based connection launching (e.g., `mRemoteNG.exe --connect hostname --protocol rdp`). Low community demand (1 thumbs up in 6 years), upstream maintainer lukeattard recommends closing or deprioritizing. Maintainer Kvarkas was mildly supportive but no one ever implemented it.
